entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Salaberry-de-Valleyfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
